tool_description: Creates a foundational survey template with basic structure, introduction text, and demographic sections tailored to specific customer satisfaction measurement objectives.

survey_title.description: The main title for the customer satisfaction survey

business_type.description: Type of business: retail, restaurant, healthcare, software, banking, hospitality, or other

survey_purpose.description: Primary purpose: product_feedback, service_evaluation, brand_perception, customer_retention, or general_satisfaction

target_audience.description: Primary audience: new_customers, existing_customers, premium_customers, or all_customers

include_demographics.description: Whether to include demographic questions section

error_messages: Invalid business type: Use one of [retail, restaurant, healthcare, software, banking, hospitality, other].
Invalid survey purpose: Use one of [product_feedback, service_evaluation, brand_perception, customer_retention, general_satisfaction].
Invalid target audience: Use one of [new_customers, existing_customers, premium_customers, all_customers].
Empty survey title: Provide a non-empty string for survey_title.
usage: Provide survey_title, business_type, survey_purpose, and target_audience. Optionally set include_demographics. The tool generates a structured template with appropriate introduction text and section placeholders.

template_id.description: Unique identifier for the created template

introduction_text.description: Generated introduction text for the survey

estimated_sections.description: Number of sections in the template
